channel.title: The Great Gatsby Podcast
channel.description: Exploring the world of Gatsby and modern web development. Join us as we dive into the latest features, best practices, and real-world applications of Gatsby.
channel.itunes:author: Great Gatsby Team
channel.itunes:summary: Exploring the world of Gatsby and modern web development. Join us as we dive into the latest features, best practices, and real-world applications of Gatsby.
channel.itunes:keywords: gatsby, web development, javascript, react, static site generation, jamstack

item.title: Getting Started with Gatsby
item.description: In this episode, we explore the basics of Gatsby and why it's a great choice for modern web development. We'll cover installation, project setup, and your first Gatsby site.
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, we explore the basics of Gatsby and why it's a great choice for modern web development. We'll cover installation, project setup, and your first Gatsby site.
item.itunes:keywords: gatsby, getting started, tutorial, web development

item.title: Advanced Gatsby Features
item.description: Dive deep into Gatsby's advanced features and learn how to optimize your site for performance. We'll explore GraphQL, plugins, and deployment strategies.
item.itunes:summary: Dive deep into Gatsby's advanced features and learn how to optimize your site for performance. We'll explore GraphQL, plugins, and deployment strategies.
